attributes.action: Change the definition of rape so that women are capable of rape.
attributes.additional_details: it is not equality when someone is treated differently because the have a penis. its just wrong.
attributes.background:
the definition of rape in the uk is "Rape is when a person intentionally penetrates another's vagina, anus or mouth with a penis, without the other person's consent." met police 
making women in capable of rape 1 in 6 males have been sexually assaulted this is significant and is never acknowledged.
